s2.title: &XercesCName; Future Releases Plan
s2.p: This document hightlights the release plan for &XercesCName;.

s3.title: Next Target Release
s3.p: &XercesCName; 1.7.0 - plan to be released in the 2nd / 3rd week of March, 2002.

s3.title: &XercesCName; Features list
s3.p: The following table lists the TODO items for &XercesCName;. It does not include fixing bugs that are opened in Bugzilla; unless such Bugzilla bug involves a major development effort and requires an architectural redesign, or is an enhancement suggestion.
Only those features that have volunteer identified will have a 'Target Date'. Those features that have 'Complete' status will be included in the 'Next Target Release'.

tr.td: Directory sane_include reorganization: add sub-directory 'xercesc' to src / include folder. (proposed by Murray Cumming)
More IDOM test cases - port IDOMMemTest, and merge ThreadTest and IThreadTest.
Use IDOM in schema processing for faster performance.
Add support for building with new MacOSURLAccessCF NetAccessor that doesn't require Carbon but can allow Xerces to live soley within CoreServices layer.
Report Schema Error with matching column number and line number.
Claim IDOM as non-experimental, and as Apache Recommended DOM C++ Binding
Update 32 bit Solaris binary distribution from Solaris 2.6 to Solaris 2.7
Add feature http://apache.org/xml/features/nonvalidating/load-external-dtd to optionally ignore external DTD
Produce 64 bit binary distribution for AIX
Produce 64 bit binary distribution for Linux
Produce 64 bit binary distribution for Solaris
DOM Level 3 Abstract Schema Load and Save
